title: Best of the Program | 3/7/22
description:
Glenn talks with his head writer and chief researcher, Jason Buttrill, who shares what’s happening on the ground in Ukraine. Pat Gray joins to further discuss the updates in Ukraine and President Biden’s handling of the issue. Glenn warns of some tactical errors one can make when discussing current affairs with some family members.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
